module.title: Story Hierarchy & Breakdown
module.description: Learn to structure and decompose user stories effectively
learningObjectives: Distinguish between Epics, Features, and Stories

exercises.title: Epic vs Feature vs Story
exercises.details: Practice categorizing requirements into the appropriate level: Epic, Feature, or Story. Understand the characteristics and scope of each level.

startScreen.instructions: You'll be presented with various requirements and need to categorize them as Epics, Features, or Stories. Learn to identify the appropriate granularity level for each requirement.

exercises.title: Story Decomposition
exercises.details: Practice breaking down large user stories into smaller, more manageable pieces. Learn effective decomposition techniques and patterns.

startScreen.instructions: You'll work through scenarios where large user stories need to be broken down into smaller, more manageable pieces. Practice effective decomposition techniques.
